member.name: T:Brevitee.UserAccounts.DaoMembershipProvider
member.summary: This class should be moved to a different assembly for custom "Membership" providers

member.name: M:Brevitee.UserAccounts.DaoRoleProvider.InitializeFromConfig
member.summary: Initialize roles from the config file. This will look for the appSetting with the key "Roles" and assume that it is a semi-colon (;) separated list of key value pairs delimited by colons (:) where the key is the name of a role to initialize and the value is a comma separated list of users to create and add to the role.
